description: Mushrooms and blue cheese are a flavour match made in heaven in this simple vegetarian gnocchi dish.
keywords: Gnocchi with Mushrooms, Blue Cheese & Kale
name: Gnocchi with Mushrooms, Blue Cheese & Kale Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add the garlic to the pan along with the gnocchi and cook for 2 minutes, stirring. Dot the blue cheese over the top, add lemon juice to taste, scatter over lemon zest and serve immediately.
